scripts.test:core: cd frontend && npm run test -- --run && cd ../backend && python -m pytest tests/test_core_apis.py -v
scripts.version: conventional-changelog -p angular -i CHANGELOG.md -s && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.quality:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npx tsc --noEmit
scripts.quality:backend: cd backend && ruff check app/ && python -m mypy app/
scripts.ci:test: npm run test && cd backend && python -m pytest tests/ -v
scripts.ci:lint: npm run lint && cd backend && ruff check app/ && python -m black --check app/
scripts.ci:build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && python -c 'import app.main'
scripts.ci:all: npm run ci:lint && npm run ci:test && npm run ci:build
